title: docs: add duration parameter for seedance video model
author: sreerevanth

gist.headline: Setting the tempo
gist.blurb: Added the missing manual for the `duration` parameter. Now you can tell the seedance model exactly how long to boogie.
gist.summary: Updated API documentation to include the supported `duration` parameter for the seedance video generation model.
gist.impact: Developers can now confidently control the length of generated videos using the documented parameter.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the Bee holding a stopwatch next to a dancing pixel robot (seedance model representation). The robot is mid-dance move. The stopwatch indicates time control.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of Polly the Bee holding a tiny stopwatch while watching a cute chunky robot dance on a lime green (#ecf874) disco floor. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'TIME'. Nostalgic and fun.
